item.title: Robert Diab
item.description: I am a professor in the Faculty of Law at Thompson Rivers University in Kamloops, British Columbia. I write about civil liberties and human rights. A full list of my academic publications is here. Links to recent work can be found below. My summaries of criminal law can be found here. Find me on Twitter @robertdiab, or email me at rdiab [at] tru.ca
